string.text: But I do need to go farther.
Impossible... buuut, it can become passable if you hanker after it. For, let's say, 500 cash.
Good, here is your money.. stupid blackmailer.
Listen here. For one hour we will act as if no one but worms and cockroaches ever pass this bridge. But after that - please, don't take it amiss.
What kind of spoiled jerks you are! Where can I take these money from, I haven't yet been to the Zone and haven't found any single artifact?
You can't, which means that you can NOT. Come back when you have enough money. And if you decide to break through silently, we'll shoot you down like a dog.
This passage is restricted, stalker.
Come on, don't be shy. But remember, we are caring enough for now, but not for too long.
Everyone calls me... Branded One.
That's good for you.
So you are Guide, aren't you? You are the one I need.
How come that you require my assistance?
I'm from Ghost, I must meet Doctor.
You must doesn't mean that I must. Well, get him! I'll give up everything and will lead you to the secret stash at once, will I?
Ghost asked you to secure that "his" man meets the Doctor. I'm that man. I keep on Gunslinger's line.
Why haven't you said so. Good. Doctor will be waiting at Gunslinger's stash. If you are that man, whom you are giving yourself out to be, you will find the place with ease.
That's very nice of you. Thanks, I'm gone to meet that aesculapius.
Hi, stalker. I'm Guide. And what's your name?
What do you want from me?
Tell me about this place.

This is a road, which leads inside the Zone. I advise you not to poke your nose in the army post, 'cos soldiers are directed to fire on sight… There is a deserted bridge to the North with the stationary army post nearby. \nPacks of blind dogs on the plains, it's perilous for the newbies. Mutants flock the plains from time to time.
And what's with the soldiers near the bridge? How can I pass though them?

There are two variants. First - if Kuzhnetsov is on duty today: the fact is that he loves money very much. He's very likely to let you in, for a bribe. But if you have no money or someone else is on duty, then you can go a compass. Walk rightside from the bridge along the railroad mound. The point is to look out for being detected. There you will see a small tunnel, which lies under the mound. Militaries know nothing about it. But be careful, zombies adore that place.
And what is farther by the road to the North?
There is a Garbage - a gloomy place. Radioactive trash makes it impassable in some places.
Hi, stalker! I've got a business for you.
Have you smelled about anything?
Well hello. What do you want?
I don't want a business, I want an ice-cream. What do you need?
I need to find some guy.
And of course you want me to do him in...

No way. He's my uncle. He sent for me two weeks ago, saying that there was one very important task and it could be a good chance to recover for me. I came here, but he haven't met me. So, I'm hanging out here in reckless hopes to find him. But I'm not a professional - I'll be mistreated in the Zone. So, huge favor to ask you: find my relative and tell him, that I've been waiting for a week or even more for him here.
Search, as it is, is possible. But only a pathologist can promise something in this place. What is the name of your uncle, what is he and who is he?

His name is Vasiliy Petrovich. But who he is and what he is - that's a puzzle for me as well. He left us long ago, and he shows up here very seldom - once a year or two. Very brief and reserved. I know him badly myself. So if you not only find him, but find out any information about him as well, I'll pay you an award fee... Kin to kin, but he's not that relative to me eventually.
Okay, we'll see what's up there. But don't make me search for you throughout the entire Zone to deliver news about uncle.
No, sorry buddy, I have work to do and I have neither time nor effort to search for him.
All as usual. I have two news - a good one and a bad one. Which one should I start with?
Start from the first one.
The first news is that I haven't found him. This is bad, because I haven't found him. The other one is that I have not found him. This is good, because he can still be alive.
Clown, damn you. Come back when you have some factual information.

I've found him - this news is good. He was of the temperature of the environment - this news is bad. Generally speaking, he was killed in the dead city, when he was spying upon mercenaries' grouping. Whys and wherefores are unknown. Here is the proof of my words - his PDA.
Well... pity. It seems like I do have to get back home or maybe I could develop my things here. It's a pity that it happened this way, but you worked good and have fairly earned your money. Take it.

I've found him - this news is good. He was of the temperature of the environment - this news is bad. Generally speaking, he was killed in the dead city, when he was spying upon mercenaries' grouping. Whys and wherefores are unknown.
Bring me the proof of your words, will ya?
I'm here from Wolf. He sends his regards from hell. If you know what I mean.
I see... And what does he need?
Wolf has sent me to back you up. We'll be attacking the crooks.
Right now?
Immediately. Run for your guys.
A little bit later. I'll tell you when.
Then go forth. The time has come.
And you, stalker, where have you come from?
Well what? We are ready for battle.
We've been shooting quite enough. I hope Wolf will be satisfied.
We haven't knocked them all out. Lets search for those freaks and eliminate them!
text in default
I haven't come here for no reason, I'm here with an appealing question.
Well, I've changed my mind. Thanks.
Ask.
Fox, tell me, where you have been in the Zone? What have you seen?

Such a story may take few days to tell and my time costs a lot.. or a loot. Can only give you a couple of advices. "Garbage" is located 3 kilometers to the North from where I stand, where all the radioactive trash had been taken to, from power plants in 86th. Heavy radiation, hosts of anomalies and, ultimately, – abundance of artifacts, admittedly not valuable. Beware of the bandits and try not to row with “Duty” patrolmen. Scientific research institute “Agroprom” is to the west from the “Garbage”. Region is quite poor as to the artifacts, so I don’t go there often. “Dark Valley” is to the east. Sort of a weird place. Like it’s rather quiet in there, but bandits and stuff can now and then be met. Yet I sense that not everything is as simple there as it seems to be. Farther beyond the Garbage is the “Rostok” factory's territory – stalkership heart. Besides, you can come across some experienced stalker-guys.
Trader said you might know something about Gunslinger.

For some unknown reason, many have been interested in him recently. Truthfully I don’t know him personally. But I do have err.. a “contact” experience. His grouping has once fired upon my boys. No one was hurt – apparently they’ve been waiting for someone else, thus I consider it to be a tiny misunderstanding. Fouled each other across the ravine and left. O, by the way, Grey is waiting for me at the garage at the Garbage, I’ll send you the coordinates, talk to him. He knows a lot more than me.
I’m from Trader, he said that you had an information, which can prove to be handy.
Take it and try not to lose. It is important indeed.
Hey, I’m waiting for a man here, so you’d better get out of here sooner the better. Sorry, mate.
Well, so be it... Now I'm listening carefully to you.
Dude, it isn't the right time to chat! I've brought a tail after me. That pack of wolves must be shot off, lets talk afterwards.
Stalker, give me the medikit. I beg you!
Take it, matey.
I don't have a medikit... That's a crap on my back
Why can’t I get into the camp?
One has to be a total jerk to let a man from the “death truck” in. First prove that you can be trusted.
What’s that “death truck”? I can’t remember anything.

I know few, but this few is something really, really bad. Ultimately talking on this topic, especially with you, is not what I’m gonna do. Call it superstition if you like. So begone, Branded One, I'm asking you kindly.
What must I do to make you trust me?
Trader will test you and we’ll just get acquainted with you. If you are a normal one, don’t grip the gun naively and deliberately earnest and reasonable, we’ll find a common language.
Branded One, stop, there is no way for you into the camp now!
Hi, Branded One. What do you need?
Howdy. Don't you wish to sell anything?
You are familiar with most of men here. What kind of people gathered here?

Yeah, it’s hard to say explicitly... from doctors of science to laid-back bandits. Everyone receives the task to his wit. Militaries usually guard the perimeter, seldom entering the Zone. Bandits browse on the stalkers’ paths. They can bereave you of either a bribe or even life. Scientists are set somewhere deep inside it, searching for the bloody truth, idiots! There are several stalkers’ clans, but that’s another matter. People here in the camp are rather quiet and peaceful this is understood – freshly, anxious aspirers. Unless “Wolf” is familiar in here. This one has seen a lot, but to my mind he’s a bit freaky with stalkership and all, he wants to cut off this craft.
Thanks.
You’ve mentioned some stalker clans. Can you give more specific information?

You see, it’s really hard to survive in the Zone by yourself. So people gather in such clans here and there. Some for convictions, some for money. But there are lots of free stalkers, like me. Everyone is free to choose: either to join someone or to act alone on own risk and fear. Regarding the variety of groupings, I can give a roundup on the “Duty”, “Mercenaries” and “Monolith” factions.
As to the bandits. Why not to perish them once and for all? Admittedly everyone here has weapons.
Well, generally we’re trying to do that. But if one is shot down, another will butt into the Zone.
Tell me about the “Duty” faction.

These consider themselves to be Zone's witch-hunters. They think that the Zone is the malignant growth on the Earth body, and going to clear out the Zone and its inhabitants from the Earth, haven’t yet decided how-to, however. Thus shot all the mutants without distinction.
Tell me about the “Mercanaries” faction.

Generally those, who have gathered there, are not satisfied with the war in the “outer world”. Extreme Zone conditions' shooting enthusiasts. Ready to fulfil any even the dirtiest of the work. Well equipped, by random weapons in majority.
Tell me about the “Monolith” faction.

Why they’re kind of strange ones. Don’t gather artifacts. Don’t make any liaisons with anyone. Don’t trade. Believe in some crap like aliens and evolutional module inside the center of the zone, which shall change the civilization on the earth for the better. But these are only rumors. I haven’t had personal contact with them.
And do you yourself believe in anything? What’s in the center of Zone?
I believe that even the most intimate dreams can become true in the center of the Zone. But I don’t have a clue what’s in there. I trust that some day I will be able to make it there.

Everyone needs Branded One's help. I've become so popular and famous that I'll have to hide from those who wish to get my autograph, which is typical together with my head. But what was I talking about. What mess do I have to make now?

I'm called Fanatic, I've been left as the chief here after Wolf left. Yesterday several men came here from "mercenaries" group... Pathologic scoundrels... Came here and pressed upon us like we've got one day term to leave this camp... Like it's their property and that's it... Today they must come again. But today, as you understand, they won't leave it for talks.
And what have you decided to do?

We've decided to make an ambush for them. I doubt that we can resist them in frontal combat. They are well-equipped... while we've got only boys here... Generally speaking, we've decided to lie in wait at the houses, pretending that the camp is going to be abandoned, then, having seized the right moment, attack. So, a good combatant, as yourself, is welcome indeed.
This freaks me out, buddy. We don't know who's behind them or even who they really are. Nope, I don't play games like these.
Pity. Such a fighter like you are would make a significant advantage to our course. Well, it seems that we'll have to cope with our own efforts.
Mercenaries, you say... Well, we'll make a bloody bath for them. We don't let any alien jerks to command here. So you are making yourself as a hero only for money, is that right?

Sure! We'll settle accounts... I propose to spend the time remaining preparing for a battle. Here is the plan... The newbies will be sent to houses, with an order not to poke out their noses... Otherwise they can be put to sleep in a jiffy... You and I, and several more guys, who are more solemn, will set up at places around the campfire to provide a close firing. We'll let them approach the campfire and on my command we'll strike them out.... They'll come from the direction of the bridge.. I think soon enough... So search for the place to cover with an open view on the campfire and we will start on my command... However, you can of course go face to face with them, but I doubt that you've got any chances in this kind of combat... So it's up to you to decide.
Listen, Branded One, you are very apropos here. I need your help.
Let's wait for fancy pants. I sense that they will be here soon.
Yes, you're a terrible person, Branded One. I'd better be out of your way in future.
Hello, Branded One, glad to see you.
I fear myself as well, if I don't have a shot of vodka before looking in the mirror. By the way, this shot is not being served for free.
Got it, I'm not stupid. Here is your promised, non-taxed, bribe. And one more thing... I'm very gratefull for your help. Thanks, Branded One.
Hi, Branded One. How can I be useful?
How did you get here!? You mustn’t be at the camp!
Take this present. Sorry that it isn’t festively packed.

Hehe. Thanks. I'll congratulate "friends" for the splendid fireworks. Take the money. To tell the truth, you're a serious buddy. You've smote down the enemies and haven't got sweat even a bit. I can imagine what you can do, when fully replenished.
We'll see as soon as I replenish, as you say...
Well, hi. Whatcha want?
Hello. I was told that you had saved one of our guys from a mere death. Thanks, man. Take this artifact as the sign of our gratitude.
How did you pass the guards!? You can’t go inside the camp, Branded One! Leave, while you still can!
What kind of bitch you are, Branded One! Why a hell have you knocked Tolik down? If it were not for the bandits, whom you've dealt with, I'd have skinned \nyou already.
I've got several questions.
Shoot. I’ll do my best to help ya.
Thanks.
What do you know about the Zone?
Well, quite a lot. What do you particularly need.
What’s inside the Zone?

This is the very question, which I wanted to find the answer to during the last two years. But the safe path to the center of the Zone hasn’t been found yet. Several times I tried to break through with my friends. I have hardly made it to return, but my friends haven’t. If you ask why have we gone there, I’ll tell ya that we were seeking for the dream, for the wish master.
Why do you think that the dreams are to come true there?

There is a stalkers’ legend of the “wish master”. A place located in the center of the Zone, where all, even the most incredible, wishes come true. But you know what I’ll tell ya, I do know that there is only a death inside the Zone, and that “master” isn't a noteworthy. So, don’t run risks in vain.
Where has the Zone come from?
Well, something boomed in 2006. Then it emerged. I know that this is barely an answer, but believe me that the truth is obvious to few.
What has led you inside the Zone?

Our unprofitable mine has been closed in 2008. Insufficient money. Then the rumors came about the Zone to give a chance of growing rich. I had no lack of an army experience, so I ventured to do it. I can’t say that I am exceedingly rich now, but I’ve got a fair bit of brass behind my back. Typical story, as well as many others' one.
What’s the most dangerous thing in the Zone?

Well, it’s hard to say. There are so many things still dangerous and unknown that I’ve hardly seen the whole enchilada. My body is the vivid example of the Zone’s dangers: bit off toe, thinned hair over the radiation, right hip burnt in “Zharka”, bloody thing by the way. Anomaly which isn’t standing on the same place, but traversing the place. Once I had a face to face contact with the bloodsucker. I dread even recollecting how it was. Basically we can talk it through and through, but if you haven’t felt it on your skin – you won’t understand. Just one advice – be careful.
Have you heard anything about Gunslinger?

Kind of tough stalker to my mind. Not really familiar with him. However I’ve been wandering at the center of the Zone too long ago, and here to the bounds only stalker-wannabes roam. You ought to talk to somebody who works in the depths of the Zone.
What do you know about the “death trucks”?

I don’t know anything at all. Sorry, I see that you’re from there. But it’s too mystified. But working a bit in the Zone makes you superstitious indeed. Corpses in the body, dead men at the wheels… Who are they? Where have they come from… Hope not from the other side.
Listen, Sidorovich said something about making a little raid on the local ramapgers... Like they should be removed...

Could be well worth making, yeah. However you stand no chances alone. Listen here. Nearby the factory under the bridge my scouts keep an eye on these rascals. Go to see them and tell that I sent you as reinforcements for the factory assault. Should they not believe, send my "greetings from hell". It's the password.
Deal. And what's your interest in the whole affair?

Firstly, the guys will have it safer to walk around. Secondly, I was expecting a dynamite crate to be delivered, but over bandits it hasn't reached its destination. This crate I promised to serious people, so the whole situation didn't look well at all. If you deliver it to me, I'll repay.
It's a deal. Get money ready.
Excellent, awaiting for you with the cargo.
I'll overstrain myself with this heavy box, go pull it yourself.
Well, if you don't want the money, I won't be forcing you.
Phew... No more bandits... Awaiting for the promised award.
Cool!!... Yes, sure, no problem. Here is your money. Well deserved.
Yes, not bad. I'll tell the camp about your heroism. I hope they will let you in.
What's the "new chore"?
Yes, again it's connected with the militaries. You're a specialist in such business. He-he... Can you satisfy me and my curiosity?
Well, shoot what are the secrets you're keeping.

Well, the business is... Someone has delivered a case to the army post from the depth of the Zone with the report on one of the military expeditions, which was studying the Northern bounds... And this case is guarded as if it has got piles of plutonium in it. But at night there is one, or maximum two, guardsman left. You're very famous ninja guy. Steal through the army post and get that case for me. And I'll do my best to please you.
Hem... Well the sweet guy like me can break through. Ah, here it goes... I'll try...
Great, I'll be waiting. You haven't let me down yet. But, listen, don't make any noise there, because we'll have to search for a new place to live if the militaries take this as an offence.
Sidorovich, you have lost your mind - assault the army post! I'd better spit upon Voronin's face personally, if I were tired of living.
Oh. come on, that army post is just a name... Dozen of extended militaries half-drunk... But you Branded One wouldn't have refused.
Been there, returned that. But I'm hardly to believe in what I did.
Documents, have you brought the documents?
Here they are, but it took a huge effort to get them. You get what I mean?

Okay, give them to Barkeep... Listen, here is the business. Visit the camp of the greenhorns, they've got a huge problem there. They seem to be rushed by someone. And after you help them - come to me, and I will have a job for you.
Done. Take this case.

Well done, thanks a lot. Not that you can be stuffed with the mere “thanks”. Weeell, 3000, no let it be 2000 rubles and we’re done. By the way, as soon as militaries discover the loss, here will be a big mess. So, be off like a shot, speedy.
Well then, take my "first" artifact.
Great, Branded One. One more small service and we're done.
What kind of service?

Branded One... My messengers are returning from raid. I don't want to see them here - they may have brought somebody on the tail. They were spying upon the militaries, so they ought not show up here... So, get to the cabin near the road... They will be waiting for you there... Take the flash-drive from them and fetch it to me. Trival task.
Okay, deal.
You said, that there was something else to do?

Branded One... My messengers are returning from raid. I don't want to see them here - they may have brought somebody on the tail. They were spying upon the militaries, so they ought not show up here... So, get to the cabin near the road... They will be waiting for you there... Take the flash-drive from them and \nmove to me. Trival task.
Fine, deal.
Have you got some job for me?

Listen here. Bandits have encamped nearby at the factory. And they go abusing stalkers who bring me artifacts, so you understand how detrimental it is for my sales. And not only for me. They are disliked similarly here in the camp. So you can join forces to cleanse the Cordon from these bastards. And naturally, in that case I'd owe you.

So, listen here. Bandits have settled at the factory nearby. And they used to bother stalkers from time to time, who are coming with artifacts to me, which as \nyou understand harms the whole trading process. And not only mine. The camp also dislikes them. But as you've spoiled business with Tolik, Wolf won't \nhelp you. I think, that if you deal with the bandits, I'll convince him to temper justice with mercy. But, what a heck, you really have to do your best.
Well, awright, in fact I don't have any other option. I'll take it, I guess.
Good luck, Branded One.
No, I'm not going there yet. I've got other things to do.
Yeah, you're really not keeping well with your head.
Hem... earned you say... Okay, I'll go to clean the territory. Who can help me in the camp?
Wolf, leader of wannabes. Come to him, he'll provide you with feasible help.
No, nothing yet.
Give it up, Sidorovich, I have business, sorry I can't.
Okay, but don't linger for too long. They will strip that place inside out without you - you'll get nothing.
Okay then. Anything else?

All as usual. First of all I need artifacts. I pay usual price not more, not less. Sometimes I need special people for a special work. Moreover, I occasionally have special orders for certain artifacts.
Sorry, it was a tiny misstake. No orders for now.
Are there any special orders?
No, no orders yet.
Yeah, I've got something.

Hem. Yeah, here it is. There is an order on "Twist" artifact. For it is being rather inexpensive, but it for some reason is required by our money-bags. By the way, the payment exceeds the market price at least twice. And it can be found... give me the map, I'll mark the place, where it can be found.
Okay, if I find it - I'll bring it to you.

Hem. Yeah, here it is. There is an order on "Stone Blood" artifact. For it is being rather inexpensive, but it for some reason is required by our money-bags. By the way, the payment exceeds the market price at least twice. And it can be found... give me the map, I'll mark the place, where it can usually be found.
Okay, if I find it - I'll surely bring to you.

Hem. Yeah, here it is. There is an order on "Jellyfish" artifact. For it is being rather inexpensive, but it for some reason is required by our money-bags. By the \nway, the payment exceeds the market price at least twice. And it can be found... give me the map, I'll mark the place, where it can usually be found.
Okay, if I find it - I'll certainly bring it to you.
Deal. Well if I find something, I’ll try not to forget to bring it to you.
Maybe you’ve got a special work for a special person?
Branded One I've though a bit and I want to offer you something... Generally speaking you have to seek for your Gunslinger, is that right?
Let's assume it is.

Well, I've found out something on Gunslinger. There is such a stalker. He's said to have found a road to the North of the Zone. The place there is untouched... Klondike of artifacts, so to say... well... So, I'll help you to find him... but... as you understand not for free. You'll have to work it off... But, eventually, both of us will be satisfied - you'll kill your Gunslinger guy and will learn about your past... And I will learn... I mean - I'll have my own benefit from the cooperation... Hehe.. Well, what will you say? Deal?
Well... You're very likely to make my life easier... Deal.

Fine... Now listen... You're a serious minded guy... I can see that... And I, that is to say we, need such people - we, together with the other traders, are 
carrying out an investigation. The aim - is to discover the path to North to the center of the Zone. But closer to the center there is the place which prevents 
passing... I don't give a hell how your Gunslinger made it through... You see, there is a place where your brains get boiled out. Omnious place... Hm.. Well, 
closer to the point... Those guys who have been smited down by the copter, watched for the militaries nearby for me. And to all appearances, the militaries 
from the former Agroprom have found something. Something very momentous. I'm sure that it's somehow pertained to the center of the Zone. So, everything 
that was found by militaries is kept on the second floor of the Institute. And we do need it. Got it, where I am inclining to?
Well, I understood that.. But I'm just interested in what if they've discovered a plant weighting 10 tons there? What then?

No... The matter concerns the small white sack-bag. Speaking in short we pay a lot. That's because it won't be easy to steal it from the stare of SBU. They are tough fighters. Act very deliberately. Maybe you could sneak there at night. Will you cope with this?
Let's live and see....
If you get the grip-sack, bring it to me - and then take it to Barkeep. He's in charge of the business in stalkers' bar "100 Rontgen", which is on the territory of the former Rostok factory. Clear?
Details, will you give me details?

Yes, sure... Coordinates and necessary information will be copied to PDA. Generally speaking, go to the North through the Garbage, then turn westwards, and in a couple of kilometers you'll get to the Agroprom. Go mushroom-kicking the artifacts at the Garbage, but consider the counter. I advice to purchase antirad and some vodka. You don't need to shine brightly at nights because of the radiation, hehe. Well, good luck.
You've said "few more things and we're settled"... So excuse me - "my salvation" has already been worked off... And I'll cope with my problems myself!

Can you get it... you'll perish here in the Zone, and if not than you'll definitely have troubles with finding your past... while I have connections, informers... \nbesides, I'm not offering you to work for me for free, but for good money... so, give up your hesitations - you have the mere profit. And I am a man of word, \nbelieve me... Trader can't do in the other way here... They'll cast him down in a jiffy...
Listen, Sidorofwitch, what are those creatures who came to hassle greenhorns? One of them was in the exo-skeleton.

If only I knew where, I wouldn't propose piles of money for it... and most likely I wouldn't be convincing you that much. You are an infamous ninja-boy here - you can sneak everywhere. What if you find them?

This is a "mercenaries" grouping. You have bothered them a bit, while they are supposed to be tough guys, you know. But who they are is unknown. While there is quite a lot of people, very serious peaople, I must admit, who would like to know it. And they agree to pay a good cash. Rumors say that mercenaries secure the interests of one of the foreign intelligence agencies. But I need proof. If only I had any evidence. Agreements, bills, reports, notes and all this kind of stuff. So, do your best, Branded One, and I won't stay in debt.
Not that I pack it in and hurry seeking for the info, but if I hit on it or if I have an occasion to search for some facts - I'll surely look into it.
Well, try to do your best. And then I'll try to do mine. Good luck in search.
Move here, move there, bring thingummy from nowhere. Whom do you think I am to make seamlessly pointless errands over the entire Zone? No, it won't work. I have things to do, you know.
And where am I supposed to be searching for them?

I've dug out what you need. Their base is situated in the Dead city to the West from warehouses. It's fenced and guarded, no way to get there as you are. \nI've been there and exclusively as a souvenir procured such a file with documents. But it's valuable for me as a remembrance.
Oh, knock it off. Don't be so soppy.
No, we're not soppy, we just want money.
Take, you've done your best. Well this file will further in making peace and silence throughout the Zone... he-he...
Here, I've got something for you.
Well, well. Yeah, take a look, brought "Twist". Good job, Branded One, take the earned money.
Good, it's a pleasure to have a deal with you.
Well, well. Yeah, take a look, brought "Stone Blood". Good job, Branded One, take the earned money.
Good, It's a pleasure to deal with you.
Well, well. Yeah, take a look, he brought a "Jellyfish". Good job, Branded One, take the earned money.
Okay, it's nice to deal with you.
So, what have you brought?
Branded One, what are YOU doing here? Didn't I tell clearly – rush to the cabin!
Branded One, so what, have you been in X-18?

To make it short, Branded One, I’ve saved you and I won’t play dignified at all. Make it in some more tasks and we’re done. Besides we’ll see how fast will your head restore from amnesia and I’ll try to find out some info on your line. A hell knows why you need that Gunslinger, I don’t really care of the outside problems. If you urge to get him killed, then there definitely is a motive.
Get it nitty-gritty.

Oh, I like the business approach. Now choose how shall I treat you. Either I should wash your newcomers’ brains or I’ll treat with you like with a skilled stalker – received the task and go carrying it out.
Let it be like with a newcomer. I don't remember any single crap.
Better like with skilled, my mechanical memory hasn't failed me yet.

Î! That’s how we do that. Listen then: There is the “Mincer” anomalies' field nearby. And the artifact is located in the center of it. Local wannabes from the camp dread to poke their noses in there. That's why it has been scattered about somewhere there for nearly a week. It’s written all over your face that you’re not a newbie, though you remember nothing. So even in such a condition you’ll manage to bag it. Okay. Get the job done. I’ve sent the coordinates of that place to your PDA along with the information on the Mincer and its artifacts.
It’s all settled.
Hi, Branded One. Glad to see you alive.
Hi, Branded One. How is it going?
Listen, Branded One, I've told you everything, now get to your job.
I need answers to several questions.
Shoot, but I know few. You see, I’m stuck here for the eternity, while the real life is outside, in the Zone.
Thanks for the information.
What are the militaries doing in the Zone?

Militaries guard the Zone, what else can they do? The only thing I don’t get is whether they protect outside world form the Zone or the Zone from the outside world. Yep, I still can't grasp it. Military expeditions sometimes come here, they must be searching for something. But I tell you: military men do not respect the Zone, and Zone pays them back the same. Lots of them have found their dead end here. Yep, dead. What, tell more? Well, those guys look down on us all, like some kind of supreme beings. They don`t give a damn about stalker laws, never help anyone, even in the worst imaginable situation. They can even shoot you, but not out of pity. It just runs in their blood: shoot first, think later. But we treat each other pretty well. Vodka, men magazines in exchange for private goodwill. So I advise you not to bother them in vain.
Tell me about the Zone.

Zone... is not just a piece of territory 40 kilometers in diameter with the center near the nuclear plant. Zone is a really strange being. I don`t think there is a person in this world who can give you a definite answer to your question. Because Zone is something from beyond this reality. I think it`s the other world. Dangerous, strange, but, damn it, attractive. It`s like Eldorado, there even the most miserable hobo can became very, very rich. And the deeper you go into the Zone, the closer you approach to your fortune.
And what’s so dangerous in this “other world”?

He - he. Nothing dangerous, in spite of the fact that you can die any second and in every step you make. And not from the bullet of stupid military, by the way there are lots of these guys having come lately. I should also tell, that to be killed with a shot is the nicest death here. Really nice, comparing to dying in anomaly - invisible death is the deadful one. Even mutants try to avoid them. By the way mutants, yes, “children” of the Zone. Nasty creatures, I'm telling ya. So you better don`t go to the Zone without a gun. And talk to stalkers, they are good advisers as for the Zone.
Rich? I would like to know more about getting rich...

Dude, don`t tell me you know nothing about artifacts. They are the source of your potential wealth. People outside pay good dough for these souvenirs form the Zone. They are more valuable than gold and diamonds. As no gold can draw aside bullet that heads right into your belly. And artifacts do this and many other funny and useful stuff. You can get most common ones even here, but to find a treasure, you`ll have to go to heart the Zone.
And what lies there, in the heart of the Zone?

People tell a lot, if interested, ask the other stalkers. But I don`t believe in this mystic staff. But I do credit that in the center of the Zone lies an Eldorado, a place rich in artifacts. But I've met no man who could either confirm, or deny it.
Any ideas of what has happened with me?

Son, you ask hell of questions. Everything is shady about it. You where found in a death truck - vehicle filled with corpses sometimes appear from the center of the Zone. Where they head to, no one knows. You truck crashed – bad luck, but you stayed alive. This is the most intriguing fact to me. Stalkers often find broken death trucks, but never find any survivals. Sorry, have nothing more to tell. You`ll have to figure it out yourself.
Who is Gunslinger? You know this guy?

I think I've heard of this stalker. Rumors say that he is one of few, who got to the center of Zone. Well, there are a lot of legends about “stalker who made it to the center and back”. So, I can`t guaranty the story to be true, personally I had no business with him. Maybe he works with other dealers. Want to find him, ask stalkers, maybe some of them will tell you a way.
Ghost stalker, heard of him?
It's another legendary man. But I haven't heard about him for a long time indeed. He must have died somewhere deep in the Zone.
Tell me about this place.

Suburbs of the Zone, military cordon. It is usually a calm and quite place, just military guys have fun sometimes. Stalkers pass by, only wannabes stay for long and sometimes for good, hehe. There is the novices’ camp set nearby me in the village. They can pull the trigger sometimes though. No worthy loot here. Abandoned factory by the road. Farm remnants to the North, army post to the South. By the way, militaries has set landmines in some places, watch it. There has been the bridge in the center, but in has been ruined. That`s it, I guess.
Okay, thanks.
Tell me more on the army post.

Few dozens of soldiers, they are ordered to fire on sight. So you'd better pass them around. If militaries become too dumped on, they start calling help from special forces. Those fellows are really tough. After their visits I have no clients for months. So you'd better disturb them not. I know their commander a little. He is a total drunkard. Only due to him I`m still here... alive
Tell me more about the ruined bridge.

300-400 meters to the North. You won't miss it. It was once an expensive bridge, but had been destroyed during the surge. Militaries like to lie in wait for stalkers, returning with the bribe there. So you’d better avoid that embankment, if it's not really crucial for you.
Give me the picture on the factory?

As you cross the road, you’ll see it - a ruined brick building. Everything that could be stolen, has already been stolen, so the only half-tumbled down core remains there. Bandits' favourite place. I am not aware if they’re still there, but in any case stay prudent. You’ve still got nothing to take away, but do you really need it?
Give me a wrap-up on the farm?
What a boring one you are. Simple farm as any other one. Pigs pegged out even before the Perestroika.
They've slayed your messengers... Military copter... I've managed to saved one of them, but the other two have joined the choir invisible.
Well... things happen... By the way, you had to be given the flash-drive with the information. Where is it?
Here it is, take it.

Great... Let's assume that you've passed the check-up. I'll report to the camp of novices that you're kind of an adequate one. By the way, when you were brought here you had a knife with you. I've confiscated it, what if you had troubles with your head. Now I see that you're pretty okay and I return it to you. But I warn you fairly, you'd better buy something more serious, like a rifle. You won't do much with a single knife.
I don't have it
I'm sorry Branded One, but there will be no talk until you bring it to me.

Yes, it was you, who have laid hands here. You're a jerk, Branded One. Why did you have to kill them? Okay, it's not my trouble. One of them had to have a flash-drive with the information. Where is it?
Here it is, take.

Great... Let's suppose that you've passed the check-up. If you poke your nose into the camp of the greenhorns - you'll be shot dead. By the way, when you were brought here, you had a knife with you. I have confiscated it, what of it, maybe you had troubles with your head. Now I realize that you really have troubles with it, but you will definitely die without without weapons in the Zone, so I'm returning it to you. But I warn you, one knife isn't enough for everything. You'd better buy something more serious, like, the rifle.
How are you, alive?
Oh, damn, I’m bleeding. Hand a first-aid please!?
Catch.
Thanks bro. I won’t forget it. I’ll pass it to the Wolf, he is the head in the village camp. He’ll reward you. Oh, by the way, here is the flash-drive, give it to the Trader. He knows what to do.
Sorry bro, I’m all out.
Search the corpses… Guys from our grouping must have had it.
You’ll kick the bucket anyway why should I spend kit on you.
What kind of bastard are you, don’t you understand that next time you can be in my shoes?
How are you?
Branded One, you can't even imagine, how grateful I am. Let's go to the camp, I'll tell to my guys, that you're good buddy and friendly with your head...
Well, lets go. Cos they are dashing aside from me as from the damned one. Aiming guns at my face.
Hi mate, I'm glad that you remained sound in life and limb. Have you become a millionaire or a superhero already?!
Not yet. But I'm elaborating this matter.
